name: Dune Buggy Outrage ( 3D offroad stunts game )
name_original: Dune Buggy Outrage ( 3D offroad stunts game )
description: Take the challenge in this Dune Buggy Outrage to complete the given missions.. Race your Dune Buggy  as fast as you can to be able to achive the goal and win this awesome Dune Buggy Rally.For Much Fun Imagine being in an arena trying to control your dune buggy across different Off Road Tracks, it's tricky... so you have to control the it and try your best not to fall off. Careful control will allow you to complete goals no matter how intense they get!
